meanings.sent1: The instructions were untechnical, making it easy for everyone to follow.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the untechnical approach to fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent3: The untechnical explanation of how the toaster works left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His untechnical way of approaching complex problems was surprisingly effective.
meanings.sent5: The untechnical nature of the game made it enjoyable for players of all ages.

meanings.definition: Simple or straightforward, not requiring technical knowledge or expertise
meanings.sent1: The untechnical solution to the math problem was refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The untechnical language used in the manual made it accessible to beginners.
meanings.sent3: Her untechnical approach to cooking involved throwing random ingredients together.
meanings.sent4: The untechnical way he explained the concept made it crystal clear to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The untechnical design of the website made it user-friendly and easy to navigate.
